php.LBL_CREDITLIMITS_INFO: En el sistema de YetiForce tenemos la capacidad de gestionar los límites de los comerciantes para las cuentas. Esta funcionalidad se utiliza para limitar la deuda excesiva de la cuenta en cooperación permanente. Los límites del comerciante se otorgan principalmente a estas cuentas que cooperan con nosotros durante un período de tiempo más largo y queremos extender su plazo de pago, lo que significa que la cuenta no podrá realizar una nueva orden a menos que su saldo anterior haya sido regulado [Saldo actual y documento emitido exceden el límite otorgado].
php.LBL_GLOBAL: Tax from the list of available taxes
php.LBL_ALERT_TAX_CONFIG_DESC:
Summation type:
In total:
- Total value of all taxes calculated on the value of product/services.
[Example]
There are two taxes selected: the first one 23%%, the second one 8%%. The system sums the value of both taxes from the oryginal net amount. 
In the above example for the net value 100zł, the gross amount will be (100zł * 1,31) = 131,00 zł

Cascade:
- Tax amount is calculated each time from the product/service value.
[Example]
Two taxes are selected: the first one 23%%, the second one 8%%. The system calculates the value for the first tax and then the value of second tax is added. 
In the above example for the net value of 100zł, the gross amount will be (100zł * 1,23) * 1,08 = 132,84 zł

Tax settings description:
Tax from the list of available taxes:
- Specified in settings for Advanced Modules.
Tax from products/services list:
- Specified individaully for products in the Products module.
Custom tax:
- Specified once for a selected record.
Account's tax:
- Specified individually for a selected customer.
php.LBL_ALERT_DISCOUNT_CONFIG_DESC:
Summation type:
In total:
- Total value of all discounts calculated on the basis of product/services value.
[Example]
There are two discounts selected: the first one is 20%%, the second one is 10%%. The system sums the value of both discounts from the original net amount. 
In the above example for the amount of 100zł the amount after discount will be = (100 zł - 30%%) = 70,00 zł

Cascade:
- Discount amount is calculated each time from the product/service value.
[Example]
Two discounts are selected: the first one is 20%%, the second one is 10%%. The system calculates the value for the first discount and then this amount is reduced by the value of the second discount. 
In the above example for the amount of 100zł the amount after discount will be = (100 zł - 20%%) - 10%% = 72 zł

Discount settings description:
Discount from the list of available discounts:
- Specified in settings for Advanced Modules.
Discount from products/services list:
- Specified individually for products in the Products module.
Custom discount:
- Specified once for a selected record.
Account's discount:
- Specified individually for a selected Account.
